thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Hali S

author: Hali S
title: Hali S
text: I really am happy to have found LOLA because I am passionate about doing what is best for my body. I strongly believe in organic products and I think its amazing that this company exists. So many women are putting harmful products into their bodies, and they don't even know about it. LOLA products are a great price and are great quality, and I love that they use organic cotton. They are the best option out there and I think everyone should go for it!
